sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import DiscoverApp from './DiscoverApp'; import Header from './Header'; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; import './i18n'; export default function DailyPushLanding() { const [dark, setDark] = useState(false); const { t, i18n } = useTranslation(); useEffect(() => { document.title = "Daily Push"; }, []); return (
{/* Hero */}

{t('title')}

{t('hero')}

  • ✓
    {t('features.prog')}
    {t('features.progDesc')}
  • ✓
    {t('features.tracking')}
    {t('features.trackingDesc')}
  • ✓
    {t('features.darkMode')}
    {t('features.darkModeDesc')}
{t('getApp')} {t('seeFeatures')}
{/* Features */}

{t('seeFeatures')}

{t('features.prog')}

{t('features.progDesc')}

{t('features.tracking')}

{t('features.trackingDesc')}

{t('features.darkMode')}

{t('features.darkModeDesc')}

{/* Footer / CTA */}

{t('ready')}

{t('downloadDesc')}

App Store Google Play
© {new Date().getFullYear()} Daily Push.
); }
